```{r echo=FALSE}

## Data

traits <- params$traits
x <- params$x
rownames(x) <- x[, "INSTN"]
x <- x[, traits]
```

A principal components analysis is shown to see the associations among the genotypes and some attributes.

```{r echo = FALSE, fig.height = 6, fig.width = 6}
princip <- prcomp(x, center = T, scale. = T)
summary(princip)
factoextra::fviz_pca(princip, repel = T,
                     title = "Biplot of genotypes and attributes")
```
